translations: n.（光学仪器的）镜头，光学部件；奥普蒂克量杯（酒吧用以量烈性酒）；<古>眼睛

sentences.sentence: The optic nerve is a part of the brain.
sentences.translation: 视觉神经是大脑的一部分。

sentences.sentence: Repairs to the nervous system will start with optic nerves and, in time, the spinal cord.
sentences.translation: 对神经系统的修复将从视神经开始，并适时地从脊髓开始。

sentences.sentence: Reparies to the nervous system will start with optic nerves and, in time, the spinal cord.
sentences.translation: 对神经系统的修复将从视神经开始，并适时地从脊髓开始。
